count1Details.allegedVictim2Details: according to written affidavit by Rivercom 911, Jeremiah is Rivercom 911 Operation Manager and the owner of the home located at 7599 Colockum Road where Ryan and Passenger were taken to and subsequently where defendant.name was later arrested for incident.criminalCharges.count1, incident.criminalCharges.count2, incident.criminalCharges.count3

count2Details.allegedVictim2Details: Jena arrived with Jeremiah in their GMC pickup and identified herself as a Rivercom dispatcher. Jena assaulted Ryan during the incident in an attempt to incite violence while her armed husband, Jeremiah stood near.

count3Details.allegedVictim3Details: Brandon is the owner of the red tow rescue truck labeled B&T towing from Cashmere. Brandon stole defendant.VehicleData.year defendant.VehicleData.make defendant.VehicleData.model by driving that vehicle without defendant.name authorization or consent. No prior knowledge, conset, or contact has ever existed between defendant.name and incident.criminalCharges.count3.allegedVictim3
